CustomField.formula: IF(OR(Balance_Net_Late_Payments__c<1, Account_Bill__r.Parent_Account__r.Recurring_Billing__c = TRUE), "Current or Autopay", IF(Days_Past_Due__c =0, "Current or Autopay", IF(Days_Past_Due__c <= 30 , "0-30 Days Late", IF(Days_Past_Due__c <= 60, "31-60 Days Late", "61-90 Days Late"))))
CustomField.label: Past Due Status
